summary: This document is an invoice summary from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing transportation and duty charges related to a shipment. The invoice indicates a total charge of $39.25, with specific details about the shipment's origin and destination, as well as customs duties paid on behalf of Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for transportation and duty charges related to a shipment.

events.title: Shipment Date
events.description: A shipment was sent via FedEx on January 9, 2001, addressed to Epstein.

events.title: Delivery Date
events.description: The shipment was delivered to Epstein on January 11, 2001.

events.title: Customs Entry Date
events.description: The customs entry for the shipment was processed on January 10, 2001.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated January 15, 2001, and details charges related to a shipment sent by FedEx.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $39.25, which includes duty and tax charges.
The shipment was sent from New York to Paris and was delivered on January 11, 2001.
Customs duties were paid on behalf of Epstein by FedEx, indicating international shipping.
The invoice includes a reference number and account details for Epstein's shipping account.
